topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5439c52c6368723545840100#post_5439c52c6368723545840100
[bq="Number1pegasus"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5439c10e63687269ee450100#post_5439c10e63687269ee450100
Can I be Sam and Raiden now? [/bq]
Not for another fifteen years or such.  I was sharing it cause making organs is far harder than people believe.  We could have cyborg limbs and such in ten years, but completely artificial organs that function well enough to replace your current organs are still off a while.

And yes I did change my avatar to a pun and in other nues have a nue image of Nue(the character) eating nuetella, while reading the nuespaper and watching the nues.
!http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/841/226/575.jpg!
You can't stop the punageddean, but because I got some nue nues for you cause you nue my puns can't be stopped.
